description: This file contains the main entry point of a Flutter application. It defines the MyApp widget which sets up the MaterialApp, and MyHomePage widget which displays a simple UI with a message indicating that the frontend is being generated.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget that sets up the main app theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the scaffold with app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp widget, creates the MaterialApp.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState, creates the Scaffold with app bar and body.
